title: Add support for missing Relay.link EVM chains
description: Master epic tracking integration of ALL chains supported by Relay.link that ShapeShift web doesn't currently support. Enables cross-chain bridging capabilities via Relay infrastructure. See https://github.com/shapeshift/web/issues/11902 for full details. All new EVM chains will use Pattern B (RPC-only + getKnownTokens) since no ShapeShift unchained indexer infrastructure exists for these chains.
notes:
=== FROM ISSUE COMMENTS ===

LOGO PATTERN: https://assets.relay.link/icons/{chainId}/light.png (dark: dark.png)

ARCHITECTURE GROUPS:
- OP Stack (standard): Ink, Unichain, BOB, Mode, Hemi, World Chain, Soneium, Zircuit, Lisk, Cyber, Blast, Zora, Redstone, Shape, Superseed, Manta Pacific
- zkEVM (special handling): Scroll, zkSync Era, Linea, Polygon zkEVM, Taiko, Abstract
- Arbitrum Orbit: ApeChain, Xai, Sanko
- Non-ETH gas (10 chains): Mantle(MNT), Metis(METIS), Cronos(CRO), Ronin(RON), Sonic(S), Flow(FLOW), Berachain(BERA), Plume(PLUME), Story(IP), Stable(gUSDT)

CRITICAL CHAINS:
1. Celo (42220): Native token is BOTH native AND ERC20. Relay uses wrapped CELO. Check relayTransactionMetadata.assetRequiringApproval
2. Blast (81457): Rebasing ETH from L1 staking yield. USDB also rebases. Handle in balance displays.
3. Ethereal (5064014): NOT in viem. Needs custom chain definition.
4. zkSync Era (324) + Abstract (2741): Type 113 (EIP-712) transactions. Use viem zksync chainConfig.
5. Linea (59144): Custom linea_estimateGas RPC method.
6. Sei (1329): Parallelized EVM + CosmWasm interop. CoinGecko uses sei-v2 NOT sei.

COINGECKO GOTCHAS: sei->sei-v2, plume->plume-network, zksync->zksync, metis->metis-andromeda, morph->morph-l2, gravity->gravity-alpha, boba->boba, zora->zora-network, funkichain->funki, Superposition (capital S). BOB/Zero Network have null chain_identifier. 11 chains not on CoinGecko at all.

PER-CHAIN CHECKLIST: [ ] chain-adapters [ ] caip [ ] asset-service [ ] feature-flag [ ] plugin [ ] env-config [ ] icon/logo

=== RELAY SWAPPER INTEGRATION (per chain) ===

FILE 1: packages/swapper/src/swappers/RelaySwapper/constant.ts
  - Add to chainIdToRelayChainId map: [newChainChainId]: <viem_chain>.id (or numeric chain ID)
  - Import the caip chainId (e.g., scrollChainId) from @shapeshiftoss/caip
  - Import viem chain from viem/chains (or use raw numeric ID if not in viem)
  - The reverse map relayChainIdToChainId auto-generates via invert()

FILE 2: packages/swapper/src/swappers/RelaySwapper/utils/relayTokenToAssetId.ts
  - Add case CHAIN_REFERENCE.NewChainMainnet: with ASSET_REFERENCE.NewChain + ASSET_NAMESPACE.slip44

NO CHANGES NEEDED (for EVM chains):
  - getRelayAssetAddress.ts (uses generic isNativeEvmAsset + DEFAULT_RELAY_EVM_TOKEN_ADDRESS)
  - getRelayDefaultUserAddress.ts (falls through to DEFAULT_RELAY_EVM_USER_ADDRESS default)

UPSTREAM DEPS REQUIRED (in @shapeshiftoss packages):
  - @shapeshiftoss/caip: export newChainChainId, CHAIN_REFERENCE.NewChainMainnet, ASSET_REFERENCE.NewChain
  - @shapeshiftoss/types: KnownChainIds.NewChainMainnet
  - @shapeshiftoss/chain-adapters: NewChain chain adapter class
  - viem/chains: chain config (or custom if not in viem)

RELAY API: https://api.relay.link (env: VITE_RELAY_API_URL) - no per-chain config needed

=== ASSET DATA REGENERATION (per chain) ===

After integrating each chain, run a partial assets data regen to populate the token list.

FILE 1 (CREATE): scripts/generateAssetData/<chainname>/index.ts
  Pattern (identical for all EVM chains):
    import { <chainname>ChainId } from '@shapeshiftoss/caip'
    import type { Asset } from '@shapeshiftoss/types'
    import { <chainname>, unfreeze } from '@shapeshiftoss/utils'
    import * as coingecko from '../coingecko'
    export const getAssets = async (): Promise<Asset[]> => {
      const assets = await coingecko.getAssets(<chainname>ChainId)
      return [...assets, unfreeze(<chainname>)]
    }

FILE 2 (MODIFY): scripts/generateAssetData/coingecko.ts
  - Import <chainname>ChainId from @shapeshiftoss/caip
  - Import <chainname> native asset from @shapeshiftoss/utils
  - Add case in the switch: case <chainname>ChainId: return { assetNamespace: ASSET_NAMESPACE.erc20, category: adapters.chainIdToCoingeckoAssetPlatform(chainId), explorer/explorerAddressLink/explorerTxLink from <chainname> utils }
  - NOTE: chains not on CoinGecko will only have the native asset (no ERC20 token list)

FILE 3 (MODIFY): scripts/generateAssetData/generateAssetData.ts
  - Import: import * as <chainname> from './<chainname>'
  - Call: const <chainname>Assets = await <chainname>.getAssets()
  - Spread into unfilteredAssetData: ...<chainname>Assets

COMMAND: yarn generate:asset-data
  This regenerates: src/generated/asset-data.json + related-asset-index + manifest + compressed assets

=== DRAFT PR CREATION (final step per chain) ===

After all code changes are complete for a chain, open a draft PR using the repo template.

BRANCH NAMING: feat/integrate-<chainname>-relay (e.g. feat/integrate-scroll-relay)

COMMAND:
  gh pr create --draft --title 'feat: integrate <ChainName> (chainId: <id>) via Relay' --body "$(cat <<'PREOF'
  ## Description

  Add <ChainName> (chainId: <id>) as a second-class EVM chain in ShapeShift Web with Relay bridge support.

  **Changes:**
  - Plugin registration in src/plugins/<chainname>/
  - Feature flag `<ChainName>` in preferencesSlice
  - Relay swapper chain mapping in RelaySwapper/constant.ts
  - Asset data generation via CoinGecko (`<coingecko_platform_id>`)
  - Environment config for RPC URL

  **Chain details:**
  - TVL: <tvl>
  - Native token: <token> (18 decimals)
  - Architecture: <arch_type>
  - RPC: <rpc_url>
  - Explorer: <explorer_url>

  ## Issue (if applicable)

  Part of #11902

  ## Risk

  Low risk ‚Äî new chain behind feature flag (`<ChainName>`), no existing functionality affected.

  > New chain plugin + Relay bridge mapping. No modifications to existing chain logic.

  ## Testing

  ### Engineering

  1. Enable feature flag: set `VITE_FEATURE_<CHAINNAME>=true` in .env
  2. Verify chain appears in supported chains list
  3. Verify native token balance loads (connect wallet with <token> on <ChainName>)
  4. Verify Relay bridge quote works: bridge ETH from Ethereum ‚Üí <ChainName>
  5. Run `yarn lint --fix && yarn type-check` ‚Äî must pass

  ### Operations

  - [x] :checkered_flag: My feature is behind a flag and doesn't require operations testing (yet)

  ## Screenshots (if applicable)

  N/A ‚Äî chain integration, no UI changes.
  PREOF
  )"

NOTE: Replace all <placeholders> with actual chain values from the bead description/notes.
NOTE: Use --draft flag to create as draft PR.
NOTE: Branch off develop (main branch is develop, not main).

comments.author: NeOMakinG
comments.text:
=== COINGECKO ADAPTER - COMPLETE TOUCHPOINTS (5 places across 2 files) ===

CRITICAL: The CoinGecko adapter has 5 separate places to modify for each new chain. Subagents frequently miss the chainIdToCoingeckoAssetPlatform switch case, which causes runtime failures when running asset generation.

FILE 1: packages/caip/src/adapters/coingecko/index.ts (3 touchpoints)
  1. CoingeckoAssetPlatform ENUM: Add ChainName = 'coingecko-platform-slug'
  2. chainIdToCoingeckoAssetPlatform() SWITCH: Add case CHAIN_REFERENCE.ChainNameMainnet: return CoingeckoAssetPlatform.ChainName
  3. coingeckoAssetPlatformToChainId() SWITCH: Add case CoingeckoAssetPlatform.ChainName: return chainNameChainId

  IMPORT NOTE: chainIdToCoingeckoAssetPlatform uses CHAIN_REFERENCE not chainId constants. Only import chainId constants if used in coingeckoAssetPlatformToChainId. Unused imports cause lint errors.

FILE 2: packages/caip/src/adapters/coingecko/utils.ts (2 touchpoints)
  4. COINGECKO_ASSET_PLATFORM_TO_CHAIN_ID_MAP: Add chainId to the buildByChainId loop (~line 280-310)
  5. COINGECKO_NATIVE_ASSET_PLATFORM_TO_CHAIN_ID_MAP: Add [chainNameChainId]: { [chainNameAssetId]: 'coingecko-native-coin-id' } (~line 370-390)
